title: oc6: wrong error message "not enough space available" when upload limitation is exceeded
body:
### expected behaviour
a message should appear that  the file is too big to be uploaded. even better if more helpful.

### actual behaviour
"not enough space available" is displayed.

### steps to reproduce
1. check your upload limit
2. upload a file that is bigger
3. stare at the message

the output is generated here: https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/apps/files/js/file-upload.js#l239

so, most easy to fix, but i am unsure what to write instead. my idea "file is too big for upload."  is technically correct, but not very helpful. i hope for better ideas :)

personally, the current message is very confusing, because i checked first my hard drive and quota settings to find out that there  is plenty of space and no quota limitation.

cc @jancborchardt
